Greg - Have you (or anyone else) looked at using java.awt.robot for GUI
automation?

I don't know if its any good or not, but I'll be at least evaluating it for
my next project in a month or so.  I'd be curious what others think of it.

One big hurdle in this kind of testing is timing.  You often have to make
sure that event A has finished before you invoke event B.  This can be
tricky when you are dealing with networked systems and suchwhat.  Robot's
waitForIdle() might help with that ... but like I said I haven't really had
a chance to peer too deep. 

Its described here:
http://developer.java.sun.com/developer/TechTips/2000/tt0711.html (second
article down).

 - joe
